jupyter slide

How to create slides by jupyter notebook

유용 18 Jan 2018

$jupyter nbconvert Untitled4.ipynb --to slides --post serve

slides can only open at locol server at http://127.0.0.1:8000/Untitled4.slides.html cannot open at remote client like http://192.168.0.51:8888/Untitled4.slides.html
